Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 1560.
_description: Gospel for Fifteenth Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
UNto his dissiples saide cristeAls saise mathew þe
                    ewangeliste…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat mai we se wele be a taleþat to iow now tell i
                    sale

Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO his disciples seide cristAs seiþ Matheu þe
                    Ewangelist…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor wel may he þe foode vs sendeÞat schal vs feede
                    wiþ outen ende

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
TO his disciples seide cristAs seiþ seint Mathe þe
                    euaungelist…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…ffor wel may he þe foode vs sendeÞat schal vs fede
                    withouten ende

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Vn to his dissiples said cristeAls sais mathewe þe
                    euangeliste…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That may we se wele be a taleThat I now to þow tell
                    sall

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Tyll hys disciples sayd crysteals says Saynt marke þe
                    euangelysteHe sayde es na maid at may…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe se wele be a taleþat I now tell
                    ȝow sall

HunHM129.First Lines:
How haue ȝe herd sum þynge of schryfftAnd how man his
                    hert to god schall lyfftForthi is gode þat we vs schryveAnd with
                    penauns a mend oure lyue…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…ffor well may he þe fode vs sendÞat schall vs fede
                    with oure end
HunHM129.Attributed Title:
Dominica quinta decima post festum trinitatis (f.
                    154v)
